trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 擴充 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml" /> Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段行為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner" /> control and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner" /> 控制項所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>完畢時使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>方法稱為由公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with `disposing` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`設`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When `disposing` is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>方法任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, because the <see langword="Dispose" /> method can be called multiple times by other objects, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to the <see langword="Dispose" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，因為<see langword="Dispose" />方法可以多次呼叫其他物件，才能請小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)

trans-unit.source: [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)
trans-unit.target: [覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取在設計階段用來代表控制項的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to fill an empty control.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來填滿空的控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The HTML used to fill an empty control.
trans-unit.target: 用來填滿空的控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The associated control.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the control that this instance of the designer is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 以控制項初始化設計工具，這個設計工具的執行個體與該控制項有關聯。
